creator: Twinkl Educational Publishing
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Twinkl Originals, from the world’s largest educational publisher, Twinkl.

Inspire learning through story with our unique digital library of teacher-created books for 3 to 7 year olds. Discover a diverse cast of characters in beautifully illustrated and expertly written stories that will support children’s learning about the world around them and encourage a love of reading.

- Access the full library of Twinkl Originals eBooks - new titles added regularly.
- Listen to many of the stories read aloud.
- Fully accessible offline - take the library with you wherever you go!
- Sign in using your Twinkl account details or use Guest mode to access free content.

creator: Twinkl Educational Publishing
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Twinkl Originals, a constantly-growing library of story books your children will want to read again and again! Created by teachers and designed with love, these original stories and activities will help you make precious story time memories.

Our range of original eBooks covers all ages from birth to 11, taking your children on an inspiring reading journey. Whether you’re looking for exciting bedtime books or a way to help your child improve their reading skills, we’ve got you covered, with a great range of fiction and non-fiction topics and themes to choose from, and diverse characters young readers will really identify with. It’s the perfect way for children to increase their reading miles and develop a lifelong love of reading. Download the app and see for yourself!

WHY YOU’LL LOVE THE TWINKL ORIGINALS READING APP:

An immersive, ever-expanding collection of original short stories your children won’t have heard or read before, perfect for bedtime stories or helping your child learn to read.

Designed by educators to intersect with the DfE Reading Framework.

Beautiful original illustrations created by expert designers and illustrators for added engagement.

In-app puzzles, games and activities for a truly interactive reading experience.

Earn exciting rewards for completing books and activities.

Can be used as audiobooks - optional audio gives children the choice of listening to the story, reading along or reading it independently.

Create unlimited reader profiles on any device, so multiple children can access and save their favourite books.

Choose from a range of fun avatars so children can personalise their profiles.

Progress indicator and continue reading features enable you to pick up where you left off, for a seamless reading experience.

Download books and read offline, perfect for car journeys or limiting children’s Internet usage.

Lots of titles in each age group from 0 to 11, taking your child from birth all the way through KS1 and KS2!

Selected books are available in Welsh (Cymraeg) as well as English.

There’s also an Australian content library full of books specifically tailored for Australian readers.

Read in portrait or landscape mode.

Zoom control enables you to focus on particular words, pictures or features.

WHY CHOOSE TWINKL ORIGINALS OVER OTHER READING APPS FOR KIDS?

There are lots of reasons why you can have complete trust in the Twinkl Originals app:

We’re the world’s largest educational publisher, trusted by thousands of schools, teachers and parents around the globe.

All Twinkl Originals stories and activities are created by experienced teachers, making them perfect for supporting learning and encouraging reluctant readers.

In addition to the in-app activities and games, you can find lots more supporting educational resources for each story on the Twinkl website, to keep the fun going for longer!

Our lovely Twinkl Cares team members are available 24/7, so you can access help and support with the app whenever you need it - and you can always speak to a real person.

HOW TO ACCESS THE TWINKL ORIGINALS APP:
If you already have a Twinkl Core membership or above, you have automatic full access to all the Twinkl Originals eBooks and activities - simply download the app, log in with your Twinkl membership details and start reading!
Or, for full access to the Twinkl Originals app without the wider website, you can subscribe in-app on a monthly basis.
If you’d like to try before you buy, no problem - you can access some of the app’s stories and features for free in Try! Mode. Or, take advantage of a free month so you can explore everything the app has to offer before you make a full commitment.
Download the app today to get started! And, if you have any feedback, please get in touch - we’d love to know what you think of Twinkl Originals.

Our privacy policy: https://www.twinkl.com/legal#privacy-policy
Our terms and conditions: https://www.twinkl.com/legal#terms-and-conditions
